description: Evaluation scenarios for the design-tokens skill

evaluations.name: Create a color token in DTCG format
evaluations.query: Create a design token for a brand blue color (#2563eb) in DTCG format
expected_behavior: Uses the structured color object format with colorSpace and components
Uses 'srgb' color space with normalized 0-1 values
Includes the hex property as a fallback
Produces valid JSON that matches DTCG specification

evaluations.name: Create a spacing scale
evaluations.query: Create a spacing scale based on an 8px grid with sizes xs through xl
expected_behavior: Uses dimension type with value/unit object structure
Applies $type at the group level for inheritance

evaluations.name: Set up a light/dark theme resolver
evaluations.query: Help me set up a resolver configuration for light and dark themes
expected_behavior: Creates theme modifier with light and dark contexts

evaluations.name: Validate a token file for errors
evaluations.query: Check this token file for DTCG compliance issues: {"colors": {"primary": {"$value": "#ff0000"}}}
expected_behavior: Identifies that string hex colors are not valid in latest DTCG spec
Explains the correct structured color format
Provides corrected version using colorSpace/components structure

evaluations.name: Convert hex colors to DTCG format
evaluations.query: Convert these hex colors to DTCG format: #ff6b6b, #4ecdc4, #45b7d1
expected_behavior: Converts each hex to srgb colorSpace with normalized components
Provides proper token structure with $type and $value

evaluations.name: Create typography tokens
evaluations.query: Create a typography token for body text: Inter font, 16px size, 400 weight, 1.5 line height
expected_behavior: Includes fontFamily as string or array
Uses numeric weight (400) or string equivalent

evaluations.name: Create a shadow/elevation token
evaluations.query: Create a shadow token for a card elevation with subtle shadow
expected_behavior: Includes color with alpha for shadow color
Uses dimension objects for offsetX, offsetY, blur, spread
Sets inset to false for drop shadow
Uses reasonable values for subtle elevation

evaluations.name: Set up token aliasing/references
evaluations.query: I have primitive colors, how do I create semantic tokens that reference them?
expected_behavior: Mentions that $type can be inherited or explicit

evaluations.name: Use jq to extract color tokens
evaluations.query: How can I use jq to list all color tokens from my token file?
expected_behavior: Filters for objects with $value and $type of color
Command syntax is valid and executable

evaluations.name: Create resolver with multiple modifiers
evaluations.query: Set up a resolver with theme (light/dark), density (comfortable/compact), and motion (full/reduced) modifiers
expected_behavior: Resolution order places modifiers after base sets
Explains how inputs work for selecting contexts
